LanguageData.PowerSwitch_AutoONMotionRoom: 房間內有運動物體時自動開啟。
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_AutoONMotionNearbyRange: 附近有運動物體時自動開啟。範圍：
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_AutoONEnemyNearbyRange: 附近有敵人時自動開啟。範圍：
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_AutoOFFEnemyNearbyRange: 附近有敵人時自動關閉。範圍：
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_TimerClickSwitchOnTime: 定時器：點擊設置開啟時間
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_TimerClickSwitchOffTime: 定時器：點擊設置關閉時間
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_ModOptions_EnemyDetectionVia: Switch Enemy Detection via Designator (Standard: On)
If you set this to off, the enemy detection will switch directly, without using the designator.
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_ModOptions_EnemyDetectionRan: Set the Enemy Detection range (Standard: 45% of Map-Size)
